author: Betsy Woodruff Swan
title: State report: Russian, Chinese, and Iranian disinformation narratives echoing each other
description: The three governments are pushing a host of matching messages, including that the novel coronavirus was an American bioweapon.
content: Some of the disinformation is produced by state-run media outlets, and some has been put out by the governments themselves. A website run by Russias Defense Ministry, for instance, highlighted the conspiracy theory that billionaire Bill Gates played a role in… [+6527 chars]
